attacks.name: Telekinesis
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Dream Waltz
attacks.effect: This attack can be used even if this Pokémon is Asleep. If this Pokémon is Asleep, this attack does 30 more damage.
